alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 10:38AM CST until January 14 at 8:34AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Wilcox, Clarke and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 42.0 feet, Water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community, with the road into the community being flooded at 43.0 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 43.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Saturday was 43.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 27.0 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
